content: यमक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [यम-स्वार्थे क] {@--1@} Twinborn, twin. {@--2@} Two-fold, double. --कः {@--1@} A restraint, check. {@--2@} A twin; one of a pair, a fellow. {@--3@} A great moral or religious duty; see यम (4). --कं {@--1@} A double bandage. {@--2@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Repetition in the same stanza (in any part of it) of words or syllables similar in sound, but different in meaning, a kind of rhyme, (of which various kinds are enumerated; see <ls>Kāv. 3. 2-52</ls>); आवृत्तिं वर्णसंघातगोचरां यमकं विदुः <ls>Kāv. 1. 61</ls>, <ls n="Kāv.">3. 1</ls>; <ls>S. D. 640.</ls>
